titles.title: World War I Veterans Special Pension Act
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a special pension program for veterans of World War I.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/18/1987--Introduced. World War I Veterans Special Pension Act - Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to pay (in addition to any pension already paid) a monthly pension of $150 to each veteran of World War I who meets specified service and income requirements.
